bertoli.desc: An e-commerce platform targeted at the agricultural sector, with the particularity that it accepts grain bartering as a form of payment. Developed with Next.js 13, RTQ Query, Redux toolkit, Tailwind, and Google login available.

dishDetective.desc: Mobile application developed with React Native, a recipe finder that provides a comprehensive list of nutritional data, as well as ingredients and instructions, of course. Zod, React Hook Form, SWR, and TypeScript were used in its development.

chimpance.desc: Landing page created for Chimpancé Digital, a design and development company. Developed with Next.js 13, GSAP, and Swiper. Google ReCaptcha V3 verification in the form.

payFriend.desc: Mobile application developed with React Native. The app is a virtual wallet that also allows you to manage your cryptocurrencies. Other tools used include NativeWind, React Navigation, React Hook Form, Victory, and Redux Toolkit. The screens I was responsible for were Home, Transfer, Crypto Graph, Bill Payment, Payment Receipt, and Account Transaction History. Additionally, I refactored the style of several screens created by my colleagues.

sinFronteras.desc: Mobile application developed with React Native. I was in charge of screens 1 and 2 of the registration process, as well as refactoring the professional profile screen.

zonaInmo.desc: On Zona Inmo, you can search for or list properties for sale or rent in Paraguay. While listing your properties is free, users have the option to enhance the visibility of their listings by upgrading their plan. The site was developed with Next.js, and some of the technologies used include SwiperJS, CKEditor, Google reCAPTCHA V2, Redux Toolkit, Redux Query, and Tailwind, among others.

aapresid.desc: In this major project, I was responsible for developing the 'Asóciate,' 'Levantando la Perdiz,' and 'Prospectiva' sections, as well as collaborating on a couple more. The development of this site highlights libraries such as GSAP, as animations were a key aspect of the design, along with Swiper for image and video galleries, and, of course, Tailwind for responsive design.

repower.desc: This is the corporate website of Repowerlab, whose main work is renewable energy generation. The site was developed with Next.js, and some of the technologies used include Framer Motion, Swiper, and Tailwind, among others.

ebookAgro.desc: Small landing page created with the specific goal of promoting a campaign to expand our recognition in the agricultural sector.
